Text: {d}nanna amar ban₃-da an-na en dumu-saŋ {d}en-lil₂-la₂ lugal-a-ni-ir {d}i-bi₂-{d}suen diŋir kalam-ma-na\gen lugal kalag-ga lugal urim₅{ki}-ma lugal an-ub-da limmu₂-ba-ke₄ ur gun₃-a me-luh-ha{ki}\gen mar-ha-ši{ki}-ta gu₂-un-še₃ mu-na-ab-tum₂-ma-ni\v11nh3a tam-ši-lum-bi\abs mu-dim₂ nam-til₃-la-ni-še₃ a\abs mu-na-ru ur gun₃-a-ba he₂-dab₅\v14sg3s mu-bi-im
